augments.name: A Cut Above
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

augments.name: AFK
augments.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

augments.name: Unburdened I
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped gain 30% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Unburdened II
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped gain 55% Attack Speed.

augments.name: All Natural I
augments.desc: Your Champions with no items equipped gain 120 Health and heal for 1% of their max Health each second.

augments.name: All Natural II
augments.desc: Your units with no items equipped gain 150 Health and heal for 2% of their max Health each second.

augments.name: Team Building
augments.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.

augments.name: Axiom Arc I
augments.desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Axiom Arc II
augments.desc: Your units gain 30 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Balanced Budget
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget II
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 7 Gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget+
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 9 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget III
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 10 Gold.

augments.name: Band of Thieves II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Band of Thieves I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Caretaker's Ally
augments.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

augments.name: Caretaker's Favor
augments.desc: Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

augments.name: Caretaker's Chosen
augments.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component Anvil
Level 6: Completed Item Anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items.

augments.name: Battlemage I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

augments.name: Battlemage II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

augments.name: BattlemageIII
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

augments.name: Battle Ready
augments.desc: Your team deals 3% more damage and takes 3% less damage.

augments.name: Battle Ready II
augments.desc: Your team deals 6% more damage and takes 6% less damage.

augments.name: Battle Ready III
augments.desc: Your team deals 8% more damage and takes 8% less damage.

augments.name: Best Friends I
augments.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 12% Attack Speed and 12 Armor at the start of combat.

augments.name: Best Friends II
augments.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.

augments.name: Better Together
augments.desc: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari

augments.name: Big Friend I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 9% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Big Friend II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Big Gains
augments.desc: Your team gains 100 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.

augments.name: Big Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

augments.name: Binary Airdrop
augments.desc: Combat start: champions holding 2 items gain a recommended 3rd completed item. Gain a 2 Gold.

augments.name: Birthday Present
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).

augments.name: Blank Slate
augments.desc: Immediately sell your team (including bench) for double their value. Your next 8 Shop rerolls are free only for this round.

augments.name: Blinding Speed
augments.desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve bow and a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Blood Money
augments.desc: Gain 3 gold per 10 Health your Tactician loses.

augments.name: Blue Battery I
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

augments.name: Blue Battery II
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

augments.name: Branching Out
augments.desc: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

augments.name: Silver Ticket
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls.

augments.name: Titanic Strength
augments.desc: Bruisers gain % increased Attack Damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health. Gain 2 Bruisers.

augments.name: Buried Treasures I
augments.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds (including this round).

augments.name: Buried Treasures II
augments.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds (including this round).

augments.name: Buried Treasures III
augments.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

augments.name: Calculated Loss
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

augments.name: Capricious Forge
augments.desc: Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two random Artifacts each round.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing I
augments.desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing II
augments.desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing III
augments.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

augments.name: Clear Mind
augments.desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 XP.

augments.name: Cluttered Mind
augments.desc: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

augments.name: Combat Caster
augments.desc: Your team gains a 90-170 Shield for 6 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.

augments.name: Combat Training
augments.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

augments.name: Final Ascension
augments.desc: Your team deals 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.

augments.name: Partial Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

augments.name: Rolling For Days I
augments.desc: Gain 9 free Shop rerolls that never expire.

augments.name: Seeing Double I
augments.desc: Gain a random item made from 2 of the same component and 2 gold.

augments.name: Seeing Double II
augments.desc: Gain a random item made from 2 of the same component and 10 gold.

augments.name: Seeing Double III
augments.desc: Gain 2 random items made from 2 of the same component and 4 gold.

augments.name: Component Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random item components.

augments.name: Consistency
augments.desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

augments.name: Contagion
augments.desc: Combat Start: Infect the highest health enemy, increasing their damage taken by 18%. Every 5 seconds and on death, the infection spreads to 2 nearby units.

augments.name: Crash Test Dummies
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1.25 seconds.

augments.name: Crown Guarded
augments.desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 75% stronger.

augments.name: Cursed Crown
augments.desc: Gain +2 max team size, but take 100% more player damage when you lose a player combat.

augments.name: Component Buffet
augments.desc: Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

augments.name: Cutting Corners
augments.desc: Leveling up costs 3 XP less.

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 health.

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 30% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech I
augments.desc: Your units holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech II
augments.desc: Your units holding an item gain 120 Health and 15% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech III
augments.desc: Your units holding an item gain 250 Health and 20% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 30 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 40 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 60 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

augments.name: Parting Gifts
augments.desc: When a champion dies, the nearest ally with open slots receieves a temporary copy of an item they were holding and a 10% max Health Shield.

augments.name: Dedication
augments.desc: The first time you field at least 4 distinct units of the same trait in a player combat, gain an Emblem for that trait.

augments.name: Determined investors
augments.desc:
The first time you have 40 gold at the end of combat, gain Diamond Hands and 2 item component(s).

This defensive item helps you gain more gold.

augments.name: Disintegrator I
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Disintegrator II
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Disintegrator III
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Exiles I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 50% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Stand United I
augments.desc: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your team.

augments.name: Stand United II
augments.desc: Your units gain 2.5% Attack Damage and 2.5 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

augments.name: Stand United III
augments.desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your team.

augments.name: Spoils of War I
augments.desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

augments.name: Spoils of War II
augments.desc: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

augments.name: Spoils of War III
augments.desc: Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.

augments.name: Early Education
augments.desc: Your units permanently gain 1 Ability Power whenever they kill an enemy. Champions start with 15 bonus Ability Power.

augments.name: Electrocharge I
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 30-90 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge II
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge III
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 100-205 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Endurance Training
augments.desc: Your champions permanently gain 18 Health every time they kill an enemy. Champions start with 100 bonus Health.

augments.name: Mana Burn
augments.desc: All enemies take 1% of their max Health as true damage each second until they cast their Ability. Gain a Shroud of Stillness.

augments.name: Escort Quest
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. You gain 3 gold every time it survives player combat.

augments.name: Featherweights I
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 15% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights II
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 30% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights III
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 50% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Final Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain a random component, 12 gold, and a Reforger.

augments.name: Final Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random components, 15 gold, and a Magentic Remover.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 2 random components, a Champion Duplicator, and a Spatula.

augments.name: Final Reserves
augments.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 70 XP and set your gold to 50. Excess gold is converted to XP.

augments.name: First Aid Kit
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

augments.name: First Aid Kit II
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

augments.name: Unified Resistance I
augments.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Unified Resistance II
augments.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Fully Adapted
augments.desc: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects, regardless of position.

augments.name: Future Sight I
augments.desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

augments.name: Future Sight II
augments.desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

augments.name: Prismatic Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Gadget Expert
augments.desc: Direct Damage items deal 25% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.

augments.name: Gargantuan Resolve
augments.desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.

augments.name: Giant Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random components, 4 gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Spectral Supplies
augments.desc: Combat start: Distribute 4 temporary items to the champions with the fewest items.

augments.name: Gifts from the fallen
augments.desc:
Your team gains 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Each time an ally dies, gain these stats again.

augments.name: Going Long
augments.desc: You no longer gain interest. Gain 10 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

augments.name: Good For Something II
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.

augments.name: Good For Something I
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 35% to drop 1 gold on death.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast!
augments.desc: Your team generates 10% more mana and moves 35% faster.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast! II
augments.desc: Your team generates 20% more mana and moves 60% faster.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast!!! III
augments.desc: Your team generates 30% more mana and moves 100% faster.

augments.name: High Roller
augments.desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 3 gold.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus III
augments.desc: Your team gains 40% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

augments.name: Harmacist I
augments.desc:
Your team has 10% Omnivamp and convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Harmacist II
augments.desc:
Your team has 15% Omnivamp and convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Harmacist III
augments.desc: Your team has 25% Omnivamp and converts 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

augments.name: Healing Orbs I
augments.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 225.

augments.name: Healing Orbs II
augments.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 450.

augments.name: Heavy Hitters
augments.desc: Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1% of their max Health.

augments.name: Hedge Fund
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

augments.name: Hedge Fund+
augments.desc: Gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

augments.name: Hedge Fund++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

augments.name: Help Is On The Way
augments.desc: After 8 player combats. choose 1 of 4 Support items.

augments.name: Heroic grab bag
augments.desc: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 6 gold.

augments.name: Shopping Spree
augments.desc: Gain 3 gold. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.

augments.name: High End Shopping
augments.desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Hustler
augments.desc: Instead of having no interest, you get 3 golds at the beginning of player combat rounds.

augments.name: Idealism
augments.desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding this item deal 12% increased damage.

augments.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
augments.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Scrappy Inventions
augments.desc: Combat start: Up to 5 equipped components turn into completed items for the rest of combat. Gain a component at the start of the next 2 stages.

augments.name: Inconsistency
augments.desc: If your streak is less than 3, gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Indomitable Will
augments.desc: When your units score a Takedown they shed all negative effects and become immune to Crowd Control for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Infernal Contract
augments.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 90 Gold.

augments.name: Infusion
augments.desc: Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.

augments.name: Inspiring Epitaph
augments.desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.

augments.name: Iron Assets
augments.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 4 Gold.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item, a random component, and 1 gold.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag III
augments.desc: Gain 2 random full items and 4 Gold.

augments.name: It Pays To Learn
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP and 8 gold.

augments.name: It Pays to Learn II
augments.desc: Gain 16 XP and 12 gold.

augments.name: It Pays to Learn III
augments.desc: Gain 24 XP and 16 gold.

augments.name: Missing Link
augments.desc: After you refresh your shop 40 times, gain a copy of each Tier 5 unit.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus II
augments.desc: Your team gains 15% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

augments.name: Frequent Flier
augments.desc: After you reroll your shop 8 times, reroll only cost 1 gold.

augments.name: Keepers I
augments.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 175 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

augments.name: Keepers II
augments.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 260 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

augments.name: Knife's Edge I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 55% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Library Card
augments.desc: Gain a Tome of Traits and a Component Anvil

augments.name: Know Your Enemy
augments.desc: Your team deals 10% more damage. Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

augments.name: Last Stand
augments.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 160 Health, 16 Armor and Magic Resist, and 16% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Lategame Specialist
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

augments.name: Patient Study
augments.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

augments.name: Learning To Spell
augments.desc: Your team gains 18 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus I
augments.desc: Combat Start: Your strongest unit gains 40% critical strike chance and their spells can critically strike.

augments.name: Little Buddies
augments.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 9% Attack Speed for each 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 8 player combats.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: Long Distance Pals
augments.desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest form each other form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

augments.name: Latent Forge
augments.desc: After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil .

augments.name: Low Interest Rates
augments.desc: Your max interest is capped at 4 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves+
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Lucky Streak
augments.desc: Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Luden's Echo I
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 35-80 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo II
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo III
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-210 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor II
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor III
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Martyr
augments.desc: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their amx Health.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.

augments.name: Medium-End Shopping
augments.desc: Gain a 1 gold. Champions appear in the first 3 slots of your Shop as if you were 1 level higher.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

augments.name: Missed Connections
augments.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

augments.name: Wellness Trust
augments.desc: Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, heal 2 player Health.

augments.name: Money Laundering
augments.desc: You earn no interest, but at the start of every player combat round gain 1 Gold per 2 units on your bench.

augments.name: New Recruit
augments.desc: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Not Today
augments.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Magic Wand
augments.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

augments.name: On a Roll
augments.desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain up to 3 free Shop rerolls per round. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes+
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: One, Two, Five!
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

augments.name: Ones Twos Three
augments.desc: Gain 3 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

augments.name: Overwhelming Force
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Pandora's Bench
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc:
Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 2 random component items.

augments.name: Pandora's Items III
augments.desc:
Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday+
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

augments.name: Portable Forge+
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 Artifacts.

augments.name: Portable Forge++
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70, 9% Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Pumping Up I
augments.desc: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Reach The Summit
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 10 gold and 50.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Blistering Strikes
augments.desc: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Return on Investment
augments.desc: When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Risky Moves
augments.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 30 Gold.

augments.name: Roll The Dice
augments.desc: Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

augments.name: Cruel Pact
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Salvage Bin+
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Scapegoat
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range.

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: The Boss
augments.desc: Gain a Sett. The first time your strongest Sett falls below 60% Health, he takes a break to do sit-ups. Each sit-up heals him 10% of his max Health and grants 40% Attack Speed and Ability Power.

augments.name: Shock Treatment
augments.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Stikk Shivs' chain lightning effect deals 40~125% more damage (based on stage level).

augments.name: Shoplifting
augments.desc: After your first shop refresh each turn, gain the highest cost champion for free.

augments.name: Silver Spoon
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP.

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Silver Veil
augments.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

augments.name: Sleight of Hand
augments.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Social Distancing I
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing II
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 16% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing III
augments.desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Stars are Born
augments.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Starter Kit
augments.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

augments.name: Stationary Support I
augments.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) equipped with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support III
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Sticks And Stones
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.

augments.name: Stimpack
augments.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Support Cache
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

augments.name: Switching Gears
augments.desc: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

augments.name: Tactician's Tools
augments.desc: Gain two Spatulas and 1 Component Anvil.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: Teaming Up I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Teaming Up II
augments.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: Think Fast
augments.desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Three's a Crowd
augments.desc: Your team gains 66 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 4 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan+
augments.desc:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

augments.name: Tiny Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain a random component, 2 gold, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Increase your current and maximum player health by 30.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

augments.name: Tons of Stats!
augments.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

augments.name: Too Big To Fail
augments.desc: On death, Bruisers deal 35% of their max Health to enemies within 1 hex. After 15 seconds, expand the range to 2 hexes. Gain an Olaf and a Gragas.

augments.name: Training Reward
augments.desc: Gain 5 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward II
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward III
augments.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Trade Sector+
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 10 golds.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-300 Health and 25-55% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different II
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 220-400 Health and 35-50% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Transfusion I
augments.desc: Your team gains 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion II
augments.desc: Your team gains 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion III
augments.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Tri Force I
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force II
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror I
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 350 Health and 35% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 500 Health, 50% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Two Healthy
augments.desc: Your team gains 99 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Silver
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a silver-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Gold
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a gold-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Prismatic
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a prismatic-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Unleashed Arcana
augments.desc: Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

augments.name: Vampirism I
augments.desc:
Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 2 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Vampirism II
augments.desc:
Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer I
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.

augments.name: What Doesn't Kill You
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

augments.name: What The Forge
augments.desc: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold.

augments.name: Woodland Charm
augments.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

augments.name: You Have My Bow
augments.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

augments.name: You Have My Sword
augments.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Young and Wild and Free
augments.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 Gold.

augments.name: Accomplice
augments.desc: Get a Support Thief's Gloves and 2 gold.

augments.name: Altruist Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Altruist Emblem and a Riven.

augments.name: Altruist Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Altruist Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Riven.

augments.name: Arcanist Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Arcanist Emblem and a Lux.

augments.name: Arcanist Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Arcanist Emblem, a Statikk Shiv, and a Lux.

augments.name: At What Cost
augments.desc: Immediately go to level 6. You don't get to choose your future augments. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Ba-BOOM!
augments.desc: Your champions deal 75% more damage for 2 seconds on every other cast.

augments.name: Behemoth Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Behemoth Emblem, a Shen, and a Thresh.

augments.name: Behemoth Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Behemoth Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, a Yorick, and a Thresh.

augments.name: Lunch Money
augments.desc: Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

augments.name: Boiling Point
augments.desc: Porcelains' attacks grant 3 bonus Mana. While boiling, their attacks also Burn and Wound. Gain a Lux.

augments.name: Bruiser Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and an Aatrox.

augments.name: Bruiser Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and an Aatrox.

augments.name: Build a Bud!
augments.desc: Gain a random three star 1-cost unit and 8 gold.

augments.name: Call to Adventure
augments.desc: Every 2 takedowns, Storyweaver Kayle permanently gains 3 Ability Power and 18 Health. Gain a Garen and a Sivir.

augments.name: Call to Chaos
augments.desc:
Gain a powerful and random reward.
(Randomly gain one of the following:)
[58 gold], [64 experience], [40 rerolls that do not expire], [Training dummy with 2x Zeke's Herald], [Training dummy with 2x Locket of the Iron Solari], [3x Hullcrushers and an item remover], [3x Snipers focus and an item remover], [Random 3-star 3-cost unit and 20 gold], [3x Thief's Gloves and an item remover], [5 random emblems(no duplicates) and an item remover]

augments.name: Divine Rolls
augments.desc: At the start of every stage, including this one, gain 4 free rerolls + 1 for each of your Heavenly champions. Gain a Kha'Zix and a Malphite.

augments.name: Dragon's Spirit
augments.desc: Gain a Dragon's Claw. Every time you heal 7000 Health with Dragon's Claws, gain an item component, up to 4.

augments.name: Dragonlord Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Dragonlord Emblem, a Janna, and a Diana.

augments.name: Dragonlord Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Dragonlord emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Janna.

augments.name: Drop Blossom!
augments.desc: Gain a Neeko. Your strongest Neeko's spell Heals 35% more, and slams for 35% increased damage. Each cast increases the spell radius by 1.

augments.name: Dryad Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Dryad Emblem and a Gnar.

augments.name: Dryad Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Dryad Emblem, a Titans Resolve, and a Gnar.

augments.name: Duelist Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Qiyana.

augments.name: Duelist Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Duelist Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Qiyana.

augments.name: Dynamic Duo
augments.desc: Get a random 5-cost champion and a random champion that shares a trait with them. Get 20 gold.

augments.name: Extended Duel
augments.desc: Your Duelists start combat with 2 stacks. At max stacks, they gain 10% Omnivamp. Gain a Darius and a Yasuo.

augments.name: Enter the Dragon
augments.desc: After the dragon strikes, Dragonlords deal 20% bonus true damage. Gain a Janna.

augments.name: Epoch
augments.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 6 XP and 2 free rerolls for that round only.

augments.name: Epoch+
augments.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls for that round only.

augments.name: Ethereal Blades
augments.desc: Gain a Shen. Your Strongest Shen gains +3 Range and his spell does 100% increased damage.

augments.name: Everything Must Go!
augments.desc: Your units buy and sell for 0 gold. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Fated Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Fated Emblem and a Kindred.

augments.name: Fated Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Fated Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Kindred.

augments.name: Fine Vintage
augments.desc: Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support items.

augments.name: Fortune Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Fortune Emblem and a Teemo.

augments.name: Fortune Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Fortune Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Teemo.

augments.name: Ghostly Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Ghostly Emblem and an Shen.

augments.name: Ghostly Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Ghostly Emblem, a Bramble Vest, and a Shen.

augments.name: Grim Harvest
augments.desc: Your Reapers gain 8% Critical Strike chance and 4% Omnivamp. They gain this bonus again every time they get a takedown. Gain a Kha'Zix and Kindred.

augments.name: Haunted House
augments.desc: Enemies that die while haunted by Ghostly pass 2 extra spectre to a nearby enemy. Gain a Caitlyn and a Shen.

augments.name: Heavenly Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Heavenly Emblem and a Neeko.

augments.name: Heavenly Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Heavenly Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Neeko.

augments.name: Inkshadow Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Inkshadow Emblem and a Senna.

augments.name: Inkshadow Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Inkshadow Emblem, an Evenshroud, and a Senna.

augments.name: Invoker Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Invoker Emblem and a Janna.

augments.name: Invoker Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Invoker Emblem, a Rabadon's Deathcap, and a Janna.

augments.name: It's Going to be Epic
augments.desc: Every time a unique Mythic champion becomes Epic, gain 2 player health and 3 gold. Gain a Cho'Gath and Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Long Shot
augments.desc: Snipers gain 18% Attack Speed. Gain a Caitlyn and a Kog'Maw. After Snipers have attacked a total distance of 1200 hexes, gain a Sniper's Focus.

augments.name: Lucky Paws
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Kobuko. Your strongest Kobuko's Ability deals 250% damage. If Kobuko kills an enemy, they have a 100% chance to drop 1 gold.

augments.name: Lucky Ricochet
augments.desc: Trickshots bounce 1 additional time for 40% of original damage. Gain a Sivir and Teemo.

augments.name: Mana Shield
augments.desc: Whenever an Invoker casts, grant the lowest Health ally Shield equal to 200% of Mana spent. Gain a Janna.

augments.name: Midnight Siphon
augments.desc: Gain a Yorick. Your Strongest Yorick gains 25% max Health and additionally deals 20% of his max Health with his ability.

augments.name: Mind Over Matter
augments.desc: Arcanists grant 250% of their combined Ability Power as bonus Health to your Training Dummies. Get a Zoe and a Training Dummy.

augments.name: Mulched
augments.desc: Every round, gain 2 Dryad stacks. If a Dryad deals 5% additional damage. Gain a Rek'Sai and a Gnar.

augments.name: Mythic Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mythic Emblem and a Neeko.

augments.name: Mythic Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Mythic Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Neeko.

augments.name: Over Encumbered
augments.desc: For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slots. After, get 3 item components.

augments.name: Full Sleeve
augments.desc: Open an armory that grants an extra Inkshadow item while the trait is active. Gain a Jax and an Aatrox.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter
augments.desc: Open a special shop with three free 3-cost champions. You can only pick one, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter+
augments.desc: Open a special shop with three free 4-cost champions. You can only pick one, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Porcelain Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Porcelain Emblem and a Lux.

augments.name: Porcelain Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Porcelain Emblem, An Adaptive Helm, and a Lux.

augments.name: Prizefighter
augments.desc: Gain 1 item component(s). Every 3 wins gives you an item component.

augments.name: Radiant Refactor
augments.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvils.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

augments.name: Raid Boss
augments.desc: Combat start: Your strongest Behemoth gains 20% Health. When other Behomoths die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Cho'Gath and a Malphite.

augments.name: Raining Gold
augments.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Raining Gold+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Reaper Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Reaper Emblem and a Kindred

augments.name: Reaper Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Reaper Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Kindred.

augments.name: ReinFOURcement
augments.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.

augments.name: Sage Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sage Emblem, a Zyra, and a Diana.

augments.name: Sage Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sage Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, a Zyra, and a Diana.

augments.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
augments.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

augments.name: Sharing Is Caring
augments.desc: Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

augments.name: Slammin'
augments.desc: Gain 1 Component Anvil. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Slammin'+
augments.desc: Gain 1 Component Anvil and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Sniper Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem and a Senna.

augments.name: Sniper Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Senna.

augments.name: Spirit Guardians
augments.desc: Wardens' start of combat damage reduction is increased by 12%. 20% of damage dealt to non-Wardens is instead distributed across your Wardens. Get a Garen and a Jax.

augments.name: Storied Champion
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Garen. Your strongest Garen's Ability now grants stacking max Health instead of Shield. If he has more max Health than his target, his Ability deals 40% bonus true damage.

augments.name: Storyweaver Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Storyweaver Emblem and a Garen.

augments.name: Storyweaver Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Storyweaver Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and a Riven.

augments.name: The Golden Remover
augments.desc:
Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

augments.name: The Road Less Traveled
augments.desc: Gain 1 XP. Each unique Sage that starts combat in the middle 2 rows grants 1 XP. Gain a Zyra.

augments.name: Tiny, but Deadly
augments.desc: Your units are 50% smaller, but move and attack 30% faster.

augments.name: Too Much Candy
augments.desc: Your rerolls cost 0 gold. Every 6 rerolls, the cost goes up by 1 gold. At the start of each stage your reroll cost is reset to 0.

augments.name: Trash to Treasure
augments.desc: Reforging completed items turns them into a random Artifact and does not consume the reforger. Gain a Reforger and 2 Component Anvil(s).

augments.name: Two for One
augments.desc: Each round, get a copy of the first champion you buy that costs 3 or less.

augments.name: Umbral Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Umbral Emblem and a Yorick.

augments.name: Umbral Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Umbral Emblem, a Redemption, and a Yorick.

augments.name: Venerable Piggy Bank
augments.desc:
Gain 2 Exalted Champions. Your Exalted Soul Core gains gold instead of XP. If you lose combat, it gets 3 bonus gold.

If there no 1 or 2-cost Exalted champions, get one 3-cost instead.

augments.name: Warden Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Warden Emblem, a Jax, and an Amumu.

augments.name: Warden Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Warden Emblem, a Redemption and a Gnar.

augments.name: Well Fed
augments.desc: Bruisers heal 2% of their max Health every 1 second. Gain a Kobuko and a Rek'Sai.

augments.name: Wrath of the Moon
augments.desc: Umbral champions deal 4% more damage every second they continue attacking an enemy. Resets when they swap targets. Gain a Darius and a Yorick.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer II
augments.desc: Gain 6 gold and a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems.

augments.name: My Heart Will Go On
augments.desc: When one of your Fated pair dies, your team gains 100% of the surviving one's bonus for the rest of combat. Gain an Ahri and a Yasuo.

augments.name: Drop Blossom!+
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Neeko. Your strongest Neeko's spell Heals 35% more, and slams for 35% increased damage. Each cast increases the spell radius by 1.

augments.name: Ethereal Blades+
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Shen. Your Strongest Shen gains +3 Range and his spell does 100% increased damage.

augments.name: Midnight Siphon+
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Yorick. Your Strongest Yorick gains 25% max Health and additionally deals 20% of his max Health with his ability.
